data.name: Alice
data.text: When the beating of your heart

data.name: Alice
data.text:
Echos the beating of the drum
There is a life about to start when tomorrow comes

data.name: Bob
data.text: Will you join in our crusade

data.name: Bob
data.text: Who will be strong and stand with me

data.name: Carol
data.text:
For the wretched of the earth
There is a flame that never dies
Even the darkest night will end
And the sun will rise

data.name: Dave
data.text: Then join the fight that will give you the right to be free!

data.name: Eve
data.text:
Do you hear the people sing
Lost in the valley of the night
It is the music of a people who are climbing to the light

post.text:
Do you hear the people sing

Singing the sang of angry men

It is the music of the people

who will not be slaves again
